import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useQuery } from '@tanstack/react-query'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { walletAPI, referralAPI } from '../services/api'; import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '../components/ui/Card'; import { Button } from '../components/ui/Button'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('home'); // Fetch wallet stats const { data: walletStats, isLoading: walletLoading } = useQuery({ queryKey: ['walletStats'], queryFn: () => walletAPI.getStats(), }); // Fetch referral stats const { data: referralStats, isLoading: referralLoading } = useQuery({ queryKey: ['referralStats'], queryFn: () => referralAPI.getStats(), }); // Fetch recent transactions const { data: transactions, isLoading: transactionsLoading } = useQuery({ queryKey: ['transactions', { limit: 5 }], queryFn: () => walletAPI.getTransactions({ limit: 5, page: 1 }), }); const formatCurrency = (amount) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits: 8 }).format(amount); }; const formatDate = (dateString) => { return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'short', day: 'numeric', hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' }); }; const getTransactionIcon = (type) => { switch (type) { case 'DEPOSIT': return (
); case 'WITHDRAWAL': return (
); case 'GROWTH': return (
); case 'REFERRAL_BONUS': return (
); default: return (
); } }; if (!user?.isEmailVerified) { return (
Email Verification Required Please verify your email address to access your dashboard
); } return (
{/* Header */}

Welcome back, {user?.fullName?.split(' ')[0]}!

Here's what's happening with your crypto portfolio

{/* Stats Cards */}
Total Balance
{walletLoading ? '...' : formatCurrency(walletStats?.data?.balance || 0)}

+{walletStats?.data?.todayGrowth || 0}% from yesterday

Total Deposits
{walletLoading ? '...' : formatCurrency(walletStats?.data?.totalDeposits || 0)}

{walletStats?.data?.depositCount || 0} deposits

Total Earnings
{walletLoading ? '...' : formatCurrency(walletStats?.data?.totalEarnings || 0)}

Growth + Referral bonuses

Referrals
{referralLoading ? '...' : referralStats?.data?.totalReferrals || 0}

{formatCurrency(referralStats?.data?.totalBonusEarned || 0)} earned

{/* Portfolio Growth Chart */}
Portfolio Growth
{['7d', '30d', '90d'].map((range) => ( ))}
{projectedEarnings?.data?.chartData ? ( new Date(value).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'short', day: 'numeric' })} /> `$${value.toFixed(2)}`} /> new Date(value).toLocaleDateString()} formatter={(value) => [formatCurrency(value), 'Balance']} /> ) : (
Loading chart data...
)}
{/* Quick Actions */} Quick Actions Manage your crypto portfolio
{/* Recent Transactions */}
Recent Transactions

))}

Make your first deposit to get started

)}
); }; export default Dashboard;
